title: Add Altered Imports Tuner Shop Page

requirements.summary: Create a static Tuner Shop page displaying all content for 'Altered Imports' with hero, about, services, tagline, location, and contact sections styled with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme
acceptanceCriteria: Page exists at frontend/src/pages/TunerShopPage.tsx and renders without errors.
Hero section displays 'Altered Imports' as a prominent heading.
Services section lists all 7 specializations as styled cards or list items.
Closing paragraph and 'Build different. Build altered.' tagline are displayed.
Location 'Wenatchee' is displayed under a location heading.
Instagram @mr.altered links to https://www.instagram.com/mr.altered in a new tab.
Phone 509-679-1389 is displayed as a tappable tel: link.
Page is styled consistently with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme (dark backgrounds, amber accents, white text, Rajdhani/Inter fonts).

file_operations.description: Create a new page component that displays all Altered Imports tuner shop content. Include: (1) Hero section with the generated banner image 'frontend/public/assets/generated/tuner-shop-hero.dim_1920x600.jpg', shop name 'Altered Imports', and subheading. (2) About/mission section with the full description text. (3) Services section with 'What We Specialize In' heading and 7 service items (Honda & Acura Performance, Custom Engine Swaps, Full & Partial Engine Rebuilds, Custom Modifications & Vehicle Customization, ECU Chipping & Engine Management, Dyno Tuning & Street Tuning, Transmission Rebuilds & Drivetrain Services). (4) Closing paragraph. (5) Tagline 'Build different. Build altered.' styled prominently with amber/orange accent. (6) Location section with 'üìç Location' heading displaying 'Wenatchee'. (7) Contact section with 'üì© Contact' heading, Instagram link (@mr.altered to https://www.instagram.com/mr.altered with target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'), and phone link (509-679-1389 as tel:509-679-1389). Use the existing dark asphalt/amber theme from frontend/src/index.css (dark backgrounds, amber accents, white text, Rajdhani/Inter fonts). Reference the generated hero image using its exact workspace path.

requirements.summary: Register the Tuner Shop page as an authenticated route at /tuner-shop and add a navigation entry point accessible from within the app
acceptanceCriteria: Route `/tuner-shop` is registered in App.tsx and renders TunerShopPage.
A 'Tuner Shop' navigation entry point is visible and accessible from within the authenticated app (TopBar or Profile page).
Tapping the entry point navigates to `/tuner-shop`.
The route is protected behind AuthGate (authenticated users only).

file_operations.description: Add a new authenticated route for '/tuner-shop' that renders the TunerShopPage component. Import TunerShopPage from './pages/TunerShopPage'. Place the route within the AuthGate-protected routes alongside other authenticated pages. Ensure the route follows the same pattern as existing routes (home, reels, profile, etc.).

Add a 'Tuner Shop' navigation button to the TopBar alongside the existing Messages, Notifications, and About buttons. The button should navigate to '/tuner-shop' when clicked. Style it consistently with other TopBar navigation buttons. This provides a visible entry point for users to access the Tuner Shop page from any authenticated view.
